definition: fundamental theorem of algebra (every polynomial has a complex root)

sentences.english: But recently some people presented a new algebraic diagonalization method.
sentences.chinese: 最近有人提出一种新的代数对角化方法。

sentences.english: Operator theory, operator algebras, and applications.
sentences.chinese: 算子理论，算子代数及其应用。

sentences.english: All she must do is complete college algebra.
sentences.chinese: 她要做的就是学完学院的代数课程。

sentences.english: Monadic Boolean algebras also have an important connection to modal logic.
sentences.chinese: 一元布尔代数还与模态逻辑有重要联系。

sentences.english: IDENTITY is also called Exclusive-NOR. The article also discusses operation laws and priorities in Boolean algebra.
sentences.chinese: 文中还讨论了布尔代数的运算规律和运算次序。

sentences.english: In this paper, we discuss the classification of 3-dimensionally commutative algebras on algebraically closed field.
sentences.chinese: 研究了代数闭域上三维交换代数的分类。

sentences.english: In this paper, we discuss the classification of 3-dimensionally commutative algebras on algebraically closed field.
sentences.chinese: 研究了代数闭域上三维交换代数的分类。

sentences.english: The most intuitive development of boolean algebras arises from the concept of a set algebra.
sentences.chinese: 布尔代数最直觉的发展产生与集合代数的概念。

sentences.english: The most intuitive development of boolean algebras arises from the concept of a set algebra.
sentences.chinese: 布尔代数最直觉的发展产生与集合代数的概念。

sentences.english: The algebra AQ is called a quantum polynomial algebra.
sentences.chinese: 代数AQ叫做量子多项式代数。

sentences.english: The algebra AQ is called a quantum polynomial algebra.
sentences.chinese: 代数AQ叫做量子多项式代数。

sentences.english: In this paper, we extend the concept of quantum Lie algebra to two-parameter case.
sentences.chinese: 本文把量子李代数的概念推广到了双参数的情形。

sentences.english: The algebraic essence of residual lattices for various logical algebras was pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 进一步指出了各种逻辑代数的剩余格的代数本质。

sentences.english: Their mathematics test had questions on algebra and geometry.
sentences.chinese: 他们的数学考试有代数和几何方面的问题。

sentences.english: The meter reading will be the algebraic sum of all these sources.
sentences.chinese: 而电压表的读数则是所有这些源的代数和。
